markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gift of the Moon](/Feats.aspx?ID=2497) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Beastkin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=337" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 81 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can share your power with others, but they can't escape the werecreature's curse as easily as you can. You can cast a 5th-level [_moon frenzy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=203) as a primal innate spell once per day. At 15th level, you cast a 6th-level _moon frenzy_ instead. At 17th level, your 6th-level _moon frenzy_ grants its standard effects, except the temporary Hit Points increase to 15 and the silver weakness increases to 15. At 20th level, you cast a 10th-level _moon frenzy_ instead. The spell uses your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.
name: Gift of the Moon

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 13" pfs="Standard" > Gift of the Moon Source Ancestry Guide pg. 81 2.0 --- You can share your power with others, but they can't escape the werecreature's curse as easily as you can. You can cast a 5th-level moon frenzy as a primal innate spell once per day. At 15th level, you cast a 6th-level moon frenzy instead. At 17th level, your 6th-level moon frenzy grants its standard effects, except the temporary Hit Points increase to 15 and the silver weakness increases to 15. At 20th level, you cast a 10th-level moon frenzy instead. The spell uses your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.
